Articles.Content: Hello fellow forumers, I am wondering if anyone knows of, or could make, an adapter between the old pre-0.25 mk2 fuselage and the new 0.25 mk2 fuselage. I know this probably doesn't seem like the most useful thing but I would like one so that I can more easily use older things like TT's MK4 fuselage or the mk3 fuselage without the ugliness of connecting old to new mk2 fuselages. If someone were to be such a wonderful person and make such a part I would prefer it to be about as thin as the mk2 drone core.
